name: 1 - Mix designs for each class of concrete forwarded to Administrator at least 4 weeks prior to first delivery
2 - Where travel or placement times are, by neccessity, longer than those listed in Table 10.4 a procedure shall be submitted to the Adminstrator for approval.
Acceptance Criteria & Frequency (Project Specific) - Written, 6 weeks notice
3 - All mixes >20MPa have a trial mix complete and Administrator given 3 days notice.
Acceptance Criteria & Frequency (Project Specific) - f'c, Each Mix
4 - Concrete not incorporated into works until trial mix completed or ready mixed concrete supplier is approved.

5 - All aggregate shall be sampled in accordance with AS 2758.1 during concrete production and tested for conformance to the aggregate requirements in MRTS70 clause 7.8 or Quarry assessment and certification approved
6 - Procedure for hot weather concreting submitted 2 weeks prior to first concrete pour.
Acceptance Criteria & Frequency (Project Specific) - Visual, Ambient temp. > 35 degrees
7 - Falsework details provided to Administrator at least 4 weeks prior to erection.
8 - Procedure for underwater concreting submitted to Administrator 2 weeks prior to first pour
9 - Procedure for curing submitted 2 weeks prior to first concrete pour.
Project Manager Verify that the Above has been Constructed according to Specification
